item.title: Applying GPG and Yubikey: Part 1 (Overview)
item.description: Today is going to be the first in a series of posts I want to write about applying GPG and YubiKey. I won’t pretend that I am an expert on either GPG or Yubikey. Instead, I’ll be focusing on how I have been using GPG and a variety of Yubikey devices to enhance my computer experience. In this post, I’m going to dive into GPG and YubiKey at a high level and explain what they are to my understanding and how I am using them.
